q: Which type of cyberthreat would you like to report?

When did the incident occur?

Provide date & time in foll. format: DD/MM/YYYY, HH:MM (AM/PM)
ex: 07/08/2024, 12:23 am or 08/12/2024 11 am
What device were you using at the time of the incident?
Were there any financial losses or unauthorized transactions as a result of this incident?
Please Describe the incident briefly in 5-6 lines.
What actions have you taken since the incident?
